Text:
Hi Gang, thanks for the great Video's over the years, but unless you stop using the Pirate Bay trackers (never coming back) and switch to DHT/PEX that is make your torrent(s) using your clients INTERNAL tracker so the magnet links work, we may never download from you again as one by one the Public and Private tracking servers are forced off by legal action.

Read the Pirate Bay Blog and learn about how you and EVERYONE can replace central server based external trackers and use it NOW.  thanks.
